notable_alumni.name: Md. Abir Hasan
notable_alumni.details: Awarded as the only non-government Ph.D. applicant from Bangladesh for the Prime Minister's Fellowship for Ph.D. under the Public Administration Skills Enhancement Project for Sustainable Development Goals. Currently pursuing Ph.D. at Oxford University, UK.

notable_alumni.name: Md. Nazmul Khan
notable_alumni.details: Selected for Master's Program in Economics at New York University (NYU), USA, under the Full Bright Scholarship of the United States Government.

notable_alumni.name: Fatima Tasnim
notable_alumni.department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
notable_alumni.details: Received job offer letter from Google, the world's largest tech giant, as a Software Engineer.

notable_alumni.name: Redoan Rony
notable_alumni.achievement: Film Director, CEO, National Film Award Winner
notable_alumni.details: Bangladeshi film director, producer, and media executive who is the Chief Executive Officer of Chorki. Has spent over a decade in Bangladesh's media industry and directed popular TV series including Housefull, Fnf, Behind The Scene, and Pata Jharar Din.
awards: Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Dialogue
